title: Thunderlords on Lucian
body: Thunderlords on Lucian is so bad compared to fervor. If youre using thunderlords on ADC's period then i feel bad for you. The dmg output you get from fervor is 10x's higher than what you get from thunderlords. Ive done both on Lucian recently and fervor is just soooo much better. Just reminding everyone that there are other good keystones and thunderlords isnt the only one that exists

replies.body: I use undying grasp on adc's usually

> [{quoted}](name=KirynDawn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=grfI1W7h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-22T15:21:21.036+0000)
>
> I use undying grasp on adc's usually

Umm so you can do an extra 30 damage and healing every 4 seconds? Why?
